column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:  A Chinese man in a Mercedes-Benz jumped out of his vehicle at 10.20 pm on the 22nd of March 2019 along 214/Monivong Boulevard before the car burst into flames.------Citizens with fire extinguishers rushed to put the fire out
column4: and a firefighting team from Daun Penh arrived and controlled the blaze.
